questions.question_text: Which service must be activated on Cisco Unity Connection to utilize LDAP synchronization?

discussion.content: Activate the Cisco DirSync service in Unity Connection to access an LDAP directory

Selected Answer: BC
should be B and C

choices.A: Clear the Enable High Availability check box in the Presence Redundancy Group configuration.
choices.E: Ensure that an equal number of users are assigned to each IM&P server.
choices.C: Restart the Server Recovery Manager service in Cisco Unified Serviceability "" Network Services on both IM&P servers.
choices.D: Verify that the Cisco XCP SIP Federation Connection Manager service is running.
choices.B: Confirm that Cisco Presence Engine, Cisco XCP Router, and Cisco DB services are up and running on both IM&P servers.
Rename the User ID value for one user if different users on different clusters have the same User ID assigned.
choices.D: Assign the duplicate user to the secondary Cisco IM and Presence node.
choices.A: Rename the directory URI value for one of the users to ensure that there is no duplication.
choices.E: Delete the user ID for the duplicate user ID.
choices.C: Unassign a user from one of the clusters when the same user is assigned to two different clusters.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
If the same user is assigned to two different clusters, then unassign the user from one of the clusters.
If different users on different clusters have the same User ID assigned to them, then rename the UserID value for one of the users to ensure there is no longer any duplication.

Selected Answer: BC
The answer B and C are correct. https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/im_presence/configAdminGuide/14_su2/cup0_b_config-and-admin-guide-14su2/cup0_b_config-and-admin-guide-1401_chapter_0100000.html

choices.C: IM&P nodes in each subscluster must be configured from the same OVA template.
choices.A: If the IM&P node in sub-cluster-1 goes down, then users assigned to it are randomly split between the two remaining subclusters.
choices.B: The administrator must add one node to each subcluster for high availability.
choices.D: Each Cisco IM&P subcluster must have the same number of nodes.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
In case of SIP integration, CUC sends SIP notify messages to the phone system to turn the MWI on or OFF so “Accept unsolicited notification” should be checked under SIP profile assigned to the trunk.
In case of SIP integration, CUC sends SIP notify messages to the phone system to turn the MWI on or OFF so “Accept unsolicited notification” should be checked under SIP profile assigned to the trunk.

questions.question_text: In the integration of Cisco Unity Connection using SIP, which SIP trunk security profile option is required for MWI to work correctly?
